title: Libraries not found after 1.0.0-beta install on Linux
body:
I installed as per the instructions, and ended up with rustc unable to find its shared libraries:

```
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ sudo sh rustup.sh
rustup: installing toolchain 'beta'
rustup: gpg available. signatures will be verified
rustup: downloading manifest for 'beta'
gpg: WARNING: unsafe ownership on configuration file `/home/sf/.gnupg/gpg.conf'
rustup: downloading toolchain for 'beta'
######################################################################## 100.0%
gpg: WARNING: unsafe ownership on configuration file `/home/sf/.gnupg/gpg.conf'
gpg: WARNING: unsafe ownership on configuration file `/home/sf/.gnupg/gpg.conf'
gpg: Signature made Thu 02 Apr 2015 08:52:03 PM PDT using RSA key ID 7B3B09DC
gpg: Good signature from "Rust Language (Tag and Release Signing Key) <rust-key@rust-lang.org>"
gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature!
gpg:          There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner.
Primary key fingerprint: 108F 6620 5EAE B0AA A8DD  5E1C 85AB 96E6 FA1B E5FE
     Subkey fingerprint: C134 66B7 E169 A085 1886  3216 5CB4 A934 7B3B 09DC
rustup: installing toolchain for 'beta'
install: creating uninstall script at /usr/local/lib/rustlib/uninstall.sh
install: installing component 'rustc'
install: installing component 'cargo'
install: installing component 'rust-docs'

    Rust is ready to roll.

sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ rustc
rustc: error while loading shared libraries: librustc_privacy-4e7c5e5c.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ rustdoc
rustdoc: error while loading shared libraries: librustc_lint-4e7c5e5c.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ cargo
Process didn't exit successfully: `rustc -vV` (exit code: 127)
--- stderr
rustc: error while loading shared libraries: librustc_privacy-4e7c5e5c.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

```

But everything seems to be there:

```
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ ls -l /usr/local/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/*privacy*
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 192238 Apr 12 19:04 /usr/local/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustc_privacy-4e7c5e5c.so
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ ls -l /usr/local/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/*lint*
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 509017 Apr 12 19:04 /usr/local/lib/rustlib/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/librustc_lint-4e7c5e5c.so
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ which rustc
/usr/local/bin/rustc
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ which rustdoc
/usr/local/bin/rustdoc
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ which cargo
/usr/local/bin/cargo
```

I'm running Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS.

```
sf@sunburst:~/work/install$ uname -a
Linux sunburst 3.13.0-49-generic #81-Ubuntu SMP Tue Mar 24 19:29:48 UTC 2015 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```

Appreciate any help. Searched the issue tracker and found nothing relevant.
